PNBVHDataReader Plug-in b10 Release Notes
------------------------------------------
Release date: 20.3.2015
Version: beta 10

PNBVHDataReader is a plugin used to read skeleton data from server by TCP/IP to save work.

There are sections for the following areas:
	SDK features
	Changes in functionality
	Deprecated/obsolete functionality
	Closed issues
	Known issues

SDK Features
------------

* Receiving and parsing real-time BVH reading from binary stream.

* Receiving and sync data from multi-pc



Changes in Functionality
------------------------
* Add multi-client mode. Receiving and sync data from multi-pc


Deprecated/Obsolete Functionality
---------------------------------

Add SockRef to identify socket in multi-client. singoten mode is deprecated.


Closed Issues
-------------



Troubleshooting
---------------


Closed Issues
-------------




Beta 10 - Known Issues
---------------------


Any bugs or problems? please email us contact@neuronmocap.com
